Class Armor

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.backpackhero.model.item.Item
fr.uge.backpackhero.model.item.Armor
public class Armor extends Item
Represents an armor item that can be equipped by the hero. Armor provides protection and has an associated energy cost.

    • Armor

      public Armor(String name, int protection, int energyCost, Shape shape)
      Creates a new Armor item.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the armor
      protection - the amount of protection provided by the armor
      energyCost - the energy cost to use the armor
      shape - the shape of the armor item in the backpack
